addAliasSwitch

public AliasSwitch addAliasSwitch(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String... switchNames)
Returns an AliasSwitch mapping name to switchNames.

Parameters:
name - the name of the new alias.
switchNames - the switches that the alias maps to.
Returns:
an AliasSwitch for the new alias.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any switch name is unknown.
See Also:
AliasSwitch

getSwitch

public CommandLineSwitch getSwitch(java.lang.String name)
Returns a CommandLineSwitch matching name, if any.

Parameters:
name - the name of the switch to lookup.
Returns:
a switch matching name.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this CommandLine is strict and name is unknown.
See Also:
CommandLineSwitch

getSwitch

public CommandLineSwitch getSwitch(java.lang.String name,
                                   boolean strict)
Returns a CommandLineSwitch matching name, if any.

Parameters:
name - the name of the CommandLineSwitch to lookup.
strict - if true, will throw an exception if name is unknown.
Returns:
a CommandLineSwitch matching name.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if strict is true and name is unknown.
